basic_info.description: I'm Armen. I'm working largely with React and .NET frameworks. I program in C#, JavaScript and Python. What you are seeing now is my starter portfolio. I come from the sound design and music-producing background. I was always drawn to customizing my software tools which led me to the path of software development.

projects.title: Stoic Companion
projects.description: A lightweight app for fetching, displaying and storing philosopher's quotes with the ability to post, store and delete comments.

projects.title: SongTrack
projects.description: .NET Core app. Multi-user uploading,storing cataloging,tagging and playback of media files. Used in tracking audio projects along with the user defined database of tools used in the production.
